PROFESSIONAL PROFILE

Accomplished, senior-level Oracle Application Functional Lead with passion for developing creative solutions to critical technical projects. Adept in understanding business needs and collaborating with leadership to drive results that catalyze positive bottom-line impact. Excellent communication skills and inspiring team leader with ability to drive global success.
* Recognized as industry expert in translating business requirements into system solutions by identifying global business needs, providing innovative functionality, and delivering solutions for complex projects.
* Unique combination of highly technical proficiencies and finely tuned business acumen.
* Certified Oracle Implementation Specialist with subject matter expertise in supporting customers in all business applications including OTC, AR, AP, Expenses, P2P, system customizations, and ERP implementations.

TITAN INTERNATIONAL, INC. – West Chicago, IL | 2017 to 2018
Oracle Financials Cloud Release 13 Update 17D | AP, Expenses	
Spearheaded communication efforts by elaborating key difference between client’s legacy system and Oracle Cloud Financials. Performed demonstrations on Fusion Expenses and Fusion Payables functionality as key liaison between senior-level IT professionals and financial leadership team. Facilitated daily consultations with business, IT, and support teams on pending issues, daily activities, requirement gaps, and development timeframes.

* Lead on-site and off-shore technical teams in executing analysis, customization, and personalization of innovative cloud system.
* Achieved certification as Payables Implementation Specialist for Oracle Financials Cloud.
JOHNSON CONTROLS INTERNATIONAL – Richardson, TX / Boca Raton, FL | 2017
Upgrade from 12.1.4 to 12.2.5 and Post-Production Support | GL, AR, EB-Tax	
Provided post-production support; analyzed system design and ERP configurations during UAT (user acceptance testing) phase of Oracle ERP upgrade and OS migration to UNIX. Designed and tested Accounts Receivable (AR) setups including System Options, Receipts, Lockbox, Quick Codes, and Taxes. Wrote test scripts; resolved defects prior to go-live.
Notable Achievements:
* Resolved Order-to-Cash and EB-Tax issues in testing environment prior to migrating solution into production.
* Collaborated with first-time users and engaged with clients to assist in system assimilation and understanding.
* Facilitated training in partnership with business teams for GL, AR, and month-end closing processes.
SYNCHRONY FINANCIAL (FORMERLY GE CAPITAL) – Alpharetta, GA	2014 to 2017
Financial Functional Lead Analyst
Phase 1:  Implementation and Conversion GL and FA from 11.5.10 to 12.2.3
Phase 2:  Implementation and Conversion P2P from R12.1.3 to R12.2.3
Phase 3:  Enhancements, Upgrade to 12.2.5, and Post-Production Support
Oversaw end-to-end implementations and system upgrades following Synchrony’s split from GE. Developed Accounts Payable system with ERP from scratch. Obtained requirements, developed processes, and executed implementations across US, Canada, Europe, Asia, and Philippines. Managed team of 12 functional and technical consultants in integrating business processes, as well as executing system automation. Collaborate with developers for all coding and work with offshore team for daily workflow tasks. Established project timelines, budgets, benchmarks, and all modifications for both GL to FA and Procure-to-Pay (P2P) implementations.  Led global team in providing on-call support for critical issues. 
Notable Achievements:
* Led team as subject matter expert (SME) for Oracle Approval Management Engine (AME) and Workflows; designed complex approval processes for GL Journal Entry, Purchase Requisitions, Purchase Orders, Change Orders, AP Invoices, and AP Hold Notifications.
* Acted as Lead for Journal Approval Workflow project utilizing AME for approvals; oversaw requirement gathering, designed processes, and executed implementation ahead of time with no issues.
* Delivered solution to successfully integrate HR data between Workday and Oracle.
